dmxeffects
Interface Module

All Known Implementing Classes:
SoundModule
public interface Module

Interface defining the methods that each module must provide for interaction with the Main application. This allows for a standard set of controls to be used.

Author:
Chris Hawley

Method Detail

dmxInput

void dmxInput(java.lang.Integer channelNumber,
              java.lang.Integer channelValue)
Method to inform the Module that dmxInput has been recieved. This method is called as a slot to a signal from the Universe class, so all data has previosuly been validated.

Parameters:
channelNumber - The channel number upon which the input was recieved.
channelValue - The value recieved upon this channel.

getPanelTitle

java.lang.String getPanelTitle()
Get the text to be used as the title for this Module's panel elements.

Returns:
The title.

getMenu

com.trolltech.qt.gui.QMenu getMenu()
Method to get the menu to be displayed for this module.

Returns:
The displayable menu element.

runModeEnabled

void runModeEnabled()
Method to inform the Module that the application is now in 'Run' mode.

programModeEnabled

void programModeEnabled()
Method to inform the Module that the application is now in 'Program' mode.

setModuleChannel

void setModuleChannel()
                      throws OperationCancelledException
Method to get the module to set it's control channel information.

Throws:
OperationCancelledException - The user cancelled the deletion of existing data when changing the channel's settings.

dmxListenerEnabled

void dmxListenerEnabled()
Method to change functions based on the DMX listener thread being active.

removeChannelAssociations

void removeChannelAssociations()
Method to set that the module's channel associations have been edited, and that it should recreate them.

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Extract the name from the module, that is used in the associations.

Returns:
The name of the module.
